Remarks upon a scurrilous libel called An argrument, shewing that a standing army is inconsistent with a free government, &c.
[4], 22 p.
[s.n.], London : 1697.
A criticism of John Trenchard's An argument shewing, that a standing army is inconsistent with a free government. 1697. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
